alert.note: Alert for Eastern Rutland; Eastern Windsor; Western Rutland; Western Windsor (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 17 at 7:36AM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Rutland and central Windsor Counties through 815 AM EST... At 736 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Comstock, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Rutland, Woodstock, Castleton, Killington, Rutland City, Middletown Springs, Wallingford, Mt. Holly, Rutland - Southern Vermont Airport, Poultney, Plymouth, Clarendon, West Rutland, Ira, Wells, Barnard, Mount Holly, Poultney Village, Tinmouth and Shrewsbury. This includes Interstate 89 between mile markers 23 and 24. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Rutland; Eastern Windsor; Western Rutland; Western Windsor
